/* kr.co.dbvision.api.stm.mng.stmmng003.service.mapper.Stmmng003Mapper.selectStmmng003List */ SELECT CODEKIND_CODE, CODEKIND_NM, CODE_LT, SYS_SE, CODE_DC AS CODE_KIND_DC, REG_DT, REG_ID, UPT_DT, UPT_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.UPT_ID) AS UPT_NM
FROM STM_CODEKIND A
AND CODEKIND_CODE LIKE '%'||#{codekindCode}||'%'
AND CODEKIND_NM LIKE '%'||#{codekindNm}||'%'
AND SYS_SE = #{sysSe}
AND REG_DT >= TO_DATE(#{sRegDt} || '000000','YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS')
AND REG_DT <= TO_DATE(#{eRegDt} || '235959','YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS')
ORDER BY CODEKIND_CODE, CODEKIND_NM
